description: Try our easy to follow Choc Mousse With Salted Caramel Popcorn recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc Mousse With Salted Caramel Popcorn Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan, combine sweetened condensed milk and dark chocolate melts. Stir constantly over low heat until melted and smooth. Transfer to a small bowl, cover and refrigerate until chilled.

In large bowl, use electric mixer to beat chocolate mixture on low speed for 2-3 minutes. Add cream and beat until thick & creamy. Spoon mixture into 12 individual serving dishes. Refrigerate for 3 hours or overnight. For the salted caramel popcorn:
Pop the popcorn as per directions on pack.

Combine sweetened condensed milk, butter & golden syrup in pan and stir over a moderate heat until boiling. Reduce heat and stir constantly for 5-7 minutes until it has thickened. Stir in sea salt and popcorn. Divide gooey salted caramel popcorn over chilled mousse.
